22.4. Load the Dataset 449
# load the total acc data
filenames = [' total_acc_x_train.txt' , ' total_acc_y_train.txt' , ' total_acc_z_train.txt' ]
total_acc = load_group(filenames, prefix=' HARDataset/train/Inertial Signals/' )
print(total_acc.shape)
Listing 22.5: Example of loading a group of accelerometer data Ô¨Åles.
Running the example prints the shape of the returned NumPy array, showing the expected
number of samples and time steps with the three features, x, y, and z for the dataset.
